remarks: Generalization of the Axiom of Choice to classes.  Theorem 10.46 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 97.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-2004.)
statement:
ac6s.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ac6s.2 $e |- ( y = ( f ` x ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ac6s3 $p |- ( A. x e. A E. y ph -> E. f A. x e. A ps ) $.
$d A f x $.
$d f ph $.
$d f x y $.
$d ps y $.
